alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Shelby (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 22 at 8:42PM CDT until March 23 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Tennessee... Loosahatchie River at Arlington For the Loosahatchie River...including Arlington...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING TO EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Loosahatchie River at Arlington. * WHEN...From Wednesday morning to early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 19.0 feet, Stewart Road South begins to flood. Low-lying farm land begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 19.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 20.0 feet tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant.
